Class SparseTensor<T>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.tensors.SparseTensor<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tensor<T>
public class SparseTensor<T> extends Object implements Tensor<T>
Sparse tensor implementation using a map for non-zero elements.

Efficient for tensors with many zero elements. Uses flat index mapping: Map<Integer, T>, where key is the flat index.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

      public Tensor<T> transpose(int... permutation)
      Description copied from interface: Tensor
      Transposes dimensions according to the given permutation.

      For a matrix (rank 2), transpose() swaps rows and columns. For higher-rank tensors, specify the permutation explicitly.
